channel.title: 并归 on 不会跑

item.title: LeetCode–MergeKList
item.description: # _*_ coding: utf-8 _*_ ''' Merge k sorted linked lists and return it as one sorted list. Analyze and describe its complexity. ''' class ListNode(object): def __init__(self, x): self.val = x self.next = None class Solution(object): def mergeKLists(self, lists): """ :type lists: List[ListNode] :rtype: ListNode 采用并归的思想 """ # 过滤空链表 _list = filter(lambda node: node, lists) return self.merge_help(_list) def merge_help(self,
